attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair for owners of older vehicles to pay the same amount of road tax as modern vehicles. Many of these vehicles are owned by collectors and enthusiasts and rarely driven. These people should be rewarded for keeping Britain’s heritage alive and allowed to have the same benefits as cars built before 1974.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
